crazyballrun.game.physics

Class PhysicsEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.physics.PhysicsEngine

  • public class PhysicsEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The PhysicsEngine is responsible of creating, initializing and starting the PhysicsThread. It handles the thread-safe communication with other threads.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void end()
      Ends the PhysicsThread.

      Provides access to the physics engine.

      Sets the state of the ample concerning physics.

      Sets the level-reference for the PhysicsThread.
